member.name: T:NSubstitute.Core.Arguments.IArgumentMatcher

member.summary: Checks whether the satisfies the condition of the matcher. If this throws an exception the argument will be treated as non-matching.

member.summary: Describes how the does not match the condition specified by this class, or if a detailed description can not be provided for the argument.
member.returns: Description of the non-match, or if no description can be provided.

member.summary: Adds a callback to execute for matching calls.

member.summary: Combines two enumerables into a new enumerable using the given selector.
member.remarks: This implementation was sanity-checked against the Edulinq implementation and Eric Lippert's implementation.

member.name: T:NSubstitute.Core.Maybe`1
member.summary: Particularly poor implementation of Maybe/Option type. This is just filling an immediate need; use FSharpOption or XSharpx or similar for a real implementation.

member.name: T:NSubstitute.Core.RobustThreadLocal`1
member.summary: Delegates to ThreadLocal<T>, but wraps Value property access in try/catch to swallow ObjectDisposedExceptions. These can occur if the Value property is accessed from the finalizer thread. Because we can't detect this, we'll just swallow the exception (the finalizer thread won't be using any of the values from thread local storage anyway).

member.name: F:NSubstitute.Core.SubstituteConfig.OverrideAllCalls
member.summary: Standard substitute behaviour; replace all calls with substituted behaviour.

member.name: F:NSubstitute.Core.SubstituteConfig.CallBaseByDefault
member.summary: Partial substitute; use base behaviour unless explicitly overriden.

member.name: T:NSubstitute.Routing.Handlers.ClearLastCallRouterHandler
member.summary: Clears last call router on SubstitutionContext for routes that do not require it.
member.remarks: This is to help prevent static state bleeding over into future calls.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo.Args
member.summary: Get the arguments passed to this call.
member.returns: Array of all arguments passed to this call

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo.ArgTypes
member.summary: Gets the types of all the arguments passed to this call.
member.returns: Array of types of all arguments passed to this call

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo.Arg``1
member.summary: Gets the argument of type `T` passed to this call. This will throw if there are no arguments of this type, or if there is more than one matching argument.
member.typeparam: The type of the argument to retrieve
member.returns: The argument passed to the call, or throws if there is not exactly one argument of this type

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo.ArgAt``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the argument passed to this call at the specified position converted to type `T`. This will throw if there are no arguments, if the argument is out of range or if it cannot be converted to the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type of the argument to retrieve
member.returns: The argument passed to the call, or throws if there is not exactly one argument of this type

member.name: P:NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the nth argument to this call.
member.returns: The value of the argument at the given index

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Raise.EventWith``1(System.Object,``0)
member.summary: Raise an event for an EventHandler<TEventArgs> event with the provided and .

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Raise.EventWith``1(``0)
member.summary: Raise an event for an EventHandler<TEventArgs> event with the substitute as the sender and the provided .

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Raise.EventWith``1
member.summary: Raise an event for an EventHandler<EventArgsT> event with the substitute as the sender and with a default instance of .

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Raise.Event
member.summary: Raise an event for an EventHandler or EventHandler<EventArgs> event with the substitute as the sender and with empty EventArgs.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Raise.Event``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Raise an event of type with the provided arguments. If no arguments are provided NSubstitute will try to provide reasonable defaults.

member.name: T:NSubstitute.Substitute
member.summary: Create a substitute for one or more types. For example: Substitute.For<ISomeType>()

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Substitute.For``1(System.Object[])
member.summary:
Substitute for an interface or class.
Be careful when specifying a class, as all non-virtual members will actually be executed. Only virtual members can be recorded or have return values specified.
member.typeparam: The type of interface or class to substitute.
member.param: Arguments required to construct a class being substituted. Not required for interfaces or classes with default constructors.
member.returns: A substitute for the interface or class.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Substitute.For``2(System.Object[])

summary.para: Substitute for multiple interfaces or a class that implements an interface. At most one class can be specified.
Be careful when specifying a class, as all non-virtual members will actually be executed. Only virtual members can be recorded or have return values specified.

member.typeparam: The type of interface or class to substitute.
An additional interface or class (maximum of one class) the substitute should implement.
member.param: Arguments required to construct a class being substituted. Not required for interfaces or classes with default constructors.
member.returns: A substitute of type T1, that also implements T2.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Substitute.For``3(System.Object[])
member.summary:
Substitute for multiple interfaces or a class that implements multiple interfaces. At most one class can be specified. If additional interfaces are required use the overload.
Be careful when specifying a class, as all non-virtual members will actually be executed. Only virtual members can be recorded or have return values specified.
member.typeparam: The type of interface or class to substitute.
An additional interface or class (maximum of one class) the substitute should implement.
An additional interface or class (maximum of one class) the substitute should implement.
member.param: Arguments required to construct a class being substituted. Not required for interfaces or classes with default constructors.
member.returns: A substitute of type T1, that also implements T2 and T3.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Substitute.For(System.Type[],System.Object[])

summary.para: Substitute for multiple interfaces or a class that implements multiple interfaces. At most one class can be specified.
Be careful when specifying a class, as all non-virtual members will actually be executed. Only virtual members can be recorded or have return values specified.

member.param: The types of interfaces or a type of class and multiple interfaces the substitute should implement.
Arguments required to construct a class being substituted. Not required for interfaces or classes with default constructors.
member.returns: A substitute implementing the specified types.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.Substitute.ForPartsOf``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Create a substitute for a class that behaves just like a real instance of the class, but also records calls made to its virtual members and allows for specific members to be substituted by using When(() => call).DoNotCallBase() or by setting a value to return value for that member.
member.typeparam: The type to substitute for parts of. Must be a class; not a delegate or interface.
member.returns: An instance of the class that will execute real methods when called, but allows parts to be selectively overridden via `Returns` and `When..DoNotCallBase`.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.SubstituteExtensions.Returns``1(``0,``0,``0[])
member.summary: Set a return value for this call.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.SubstituteExtensions.Returns``1(``0,System.Func{NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo,``0},System.Func{NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo,``0}[])
member.summary: Set a return value for this call, calculated by the provided function.
member.param: Function to calculate the return value

member.name: M:NSubstitute.SubstituteExtensions.Returns``1(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0},``0,``0[])
member.summary: Set a return value for this call. The value(s) to be returned will be wrapped in Tasks.
member.param: Value to return. Will be wrapped in a Task

member.param: Function to calculate the return value

member.summary: Set a return value for this call made with any arguments. The value(s) to be returned will be wrapped in Tasks.

member.summary: Set a return value for this call made with any arguments, calculated by the provided function. The value(s) to be returned will be wrapped in Tasks.

member.summary: Set a return value for this call made with any arguments.

member.name: M:NSubstitute.SubstituteExtensions.ReturnsForAnyArgs``1(``0,System.Func{NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo,``0},System.Func{NSubstitute.Core.CallInfo,``0}[])
member.summary: Set a return value for this call made with any arguments, calculated by the provided function.
member.param: Function to calculate the return value

member.summary: Forget all the calls this substitute has received.

member.summary: Returns the calls received by this substitute.
